posts.author: CerebralPimp
posts.title: JUST IN - Mr. Beast is willing to be the CEO of X

posts.raw_content:
I’m sure it’s been happening since day one but recently it’s become a lot more noticeable. Especially after the whole Israel/Iran bombing. I’m not talking about concern trolling, that’s one thing; it’s pretty clear this is some concerted, probably paid-for effort to fracture MAGA or at least demoralize or disrupt tf out of the community. They are seemingly pro trump but will post extreme opinions that seem more intended to make MAGA look bad. Some will post literal racist shit, I assume so that other leftists can screenshot to smear all Trump supporters. Others will just engage in purposeful name calling or arguments (and I don't mean genuine, thought thru arguments; these are pretty clearly aimed at creating dissent within the community).

They are most active on the stickied posts, and when the comment is new it gets a bunch of upvotes from their bots/other leftists, but it later sometimes becomes negative when real users chime in. User NewYearNewPOTUS is probably the most annoying example.

And it makes sense; if you were the opposition, wouldn’t you spend a few thousand bucks for an influence operation over MAGA? The ROI is probably pretty high when you hire a Pakistani body farm. To think that leftists are doing ***nothing*** about this site sounds just as ludicrous.

The handshake icon was the mod team’s early attempt to curb this but I don’t think it’s working anymore. Which brings me to another question; who the hell is actually running PDW? It may have started with volunteers but I highly doubt it is anymore. The valuation of this site due to its user base is definitely in the millions of $, especially considering that it is the biggest online community supporting the now-incumbent president. It would be a highly attractive target for a takeover. There has been nothing to suggest that the Trump team themselves have anything to do with PDW. (Contrast this with Truth Social).
